      public Coords getInputBuilder​(Player player) throws java.io.IOException

      player - the current player
      Returns:

    • getInputMove

      public Coords getInputMove​(Builder builder, java.util.List<Coords> legalMoves) throws java.io.IOException
      The method asks the player where he wants to move his builder
      Parameters:
      builder - the builder chosen for this turn
      legalMoves - the possible choices for the move action
      Returns:
      the coordinates where the player wants to move the builder
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getInputBuild

      builder - the builder chosen for this turn
      legalBuilds - the possible choices for the build action
      Returns:
      the coordinates where the player wants to build on
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getInputUseEffect

      public boolean getInputUseEffect​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String god) throws java.io.IOException
      This method asks the player if he wants to use the effect of his god in this turn
      Parameters:
      player - the current player
      god - the player's god
      Returns:
      true if the player wants to use the effect, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getInputRemoveBlock

      public Coords getInputRemoveBlock​(Builder builder, java.util.List<Coords> legalRemoves) throws java.io.IOException
      This method asks the player which block he wants to remove
      Parameters:
      builder - current builder
      legalRemoves - list of blocks that can be removed
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the block that the player wants to remove
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
